alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:43PM EDT until July 24 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CHEMUNG...WEST CENTRAL TIOGA AND SOUTH CENTRAL TOMPKINS COUNTIES... At 343 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Spencer, or 14 miles south of Ithaca, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Candor, Spencer, Van Etten, Lockwood, Willseyville, South Danby, North Spencer, West Candor and Swartwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
